The claim made by state Rep: Gina Hinojosa that individuals with an active warrant for their arrest for murder can legally pass a background check system in Texas to purchase a gun.

The process of running a background chec: which involves providing a photo ID and completing a form produced by the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives.
